name: 3dRankizer
author: AFNI Team
description: Tool to rank each voxel as sorted into increasing value. Ties get the average rank.

inputs.description: Use the specified dataset as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in this mask will be used from the input dataset. Voxels outside the mask will get rank 0.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Write results into float-format output dataset
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the dataset and multiply by 100.0
inputs.name: Percentize

inputs.description: Divide rank by the number of voxels in the mask and multiply by 100.0
inputs.name: Percentize with mask

output-files.description: Output float-format dataset containing ranked voxel values
output-files.name: Output dataset
